Detailed Description

The TAPI Phone State Interface.

Function Documentation

int32 rtk_GetPhoneState ( TstVoipCfg *  pstVoipCfg)

Get the FXS/FXO hook state (This TAPI will NOT read event FIFO)

Parameters
pstVoipCfg
pstVoipCfg Description
pstVoipCfg->ch_id (In) FXS/FXO Channel number
pstVoipCfg->cfg (Out) Phone state result
Return values
0Success
See Also
rtk_GetFxsEvent, rtk_GetFxoEvent
int rtk_LineCheck ( uint32  chid)

Check FXS/FXO line state.

Parameters
chidThe FXS/FXO channel number.
Return values
ForFXS

Return value State SLIC Supported
0 Phone dis-connected Silab
1 Phone connected Silab
2 Phone off-hook Silab/Zarlink
3 Check time out ( may connect too many phone set => view as connect) Silab
4 Can not check, Linefeed should be set to active state first Silab/Zarlink
ForFXO

Return value State SLIC Supported
0 PSTN Line connected Silab/Zarlink
1 PSTN Line dis-connected Silab/Zarlink
2 PSTN Line busy Silab
Note
The FXS line state is not always reliable. It may depend on SLIC, PCB layout, length of RJ-11 line and number of Phone sets. It's just for reference.
However, FXO line state is reliable.
